items.title: Burkina Faso army says it foiled 'major' coup plot
items.description: The plotters, some ex-army officers, hatched the plan in Ivory Coast, the authorities say.

items.title: Man missing after rare shark attack in Israel
items.description: Footage posted online shows a swimmer flailing in the distance as beachgoers yell in shock.

items.title: Harvard University sues Trump administration to stop funding freeze
items.description: The lawsuit signals a sharp escalation of a feud between the elite institution and the new presidency.

items.title: Putin suggests Russia open to direct talks with Ukraine
items.description: The Russian president's proposal is the first signal of bilateral talks since the early days of the war.

items.title: Watch: Might the next pope come from Africa?
items.description: The Archbishop of Abuja in Nigeria speaks to the BBC about how the next pontiff could be selected.
